Urban and Geographic Information Systems Group

A registered student organization at the University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign

About UGIS

The Urban and Geographic Information Systems Group offers interested members a place to learn, refine, and build their technical skills through interdisciplinary activities involving GIS, data analysis, programming, web design & development, and informatics.

Our activities

  • Workshops
  • Tutorials
  • Software Demonstrations
  • Contests
  • Spatial Joins
  • Speakers
  • Professional Networking
